name: Stripe
description: Stripe payment processing platform with comprehensive financial operations

actions.name: Test Connection
actions.description: Test the connection to Stripe and verify API key

actions.name: Create Customer
actions.description: Create a new customer in Stripe

actions.name: Create Payment Intent
actions.description: Create a payment intent for processing payments

amount.description: Payment amount in smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code (e.g., usd, eur)

confirm.description: Whether to confirm the payment intent immediately

actions.name: Create Refund
actions.description: Create a refund for a charge or payment intent

actions.name: Create Subscription
actions.description: Create a recurring subscription for a customer

items.description: Subscription items with prices and quantities

days_until_due.description: Days until invoice is due (for send_invoice)

actions.name: Create Refund
actions.description: Create a refund for a payment

charge.description: Charge ID to refund (alternative to payment_intent)

amount.description: Refund amount in cents (omit for full refund)

refund_application_fee.description: Whether to refund the application fee

actions.name: List Payment Intents
actions.description: List payment intents with optional filtering

triggers.name: Payment Succeeded
triggers.description: Triggered when a payment is successfully processed

triggers.name: Subscription Created
triggers.description: Triggered when a new subscription is created

triggers.name: Invoice Payment Succeeded
triggers.description: Triggered when an invoice payment succeeds
